############## HELPER FUNCTIONS #################################################
#OUTPUT: k by n matrix of normal densities
matdnorm = function (x, mu, sigma, log=FALSE) 
{
  k=length(mu)
  n=length(x)
  d = matrix(rep(x,rep(k,n)),nrow=k)
  return(matrix(dnorm(d, mu, sigma, log),nrow=k))
}
